questionTitle: They all take too much ________ of his kindness and generosity.
Don't worry about trying to catch last train home, as we can easily ________ you up for the night.
Our car is very old, but I can't ________ to buy a new one.
It was terrible. One passenger was killed, and the other was ________ injured.
After several years their bedroom wallpaper had considerably ________.
My attempt to pass the exam was ________. I failed badly.
Chris ________ at the City College for French.
I admit I suffer from a ________ of patience with such people.
The house is in good ________ though it needs to be repainted.
Hello, Mary. I can't be sure I'll be home in time for dinner. I ________ be late.
His suit was badly made and didn't ________ him properly.
He may be quick ________ understanding, but he's not capable of remembering anything.
He has some important business to attend ________.
You should not boast ________ your success.
I'm sorry, I haven't got ________ change. Why don't you try the bank?
An oppressive ________, and not the festive mood one might have expected charecterized the mood of the gathering.
I think it's ________ your luck to drive without wearing a seat-belt.
He said that if I looked back far enough in my family tree, I would see that I was ________ related to Charles Darwin.
I can't possibly mark your homework; your handwriting is ________.
Hello! You ________ be the new assistant. I'm Mr Munroe.
